title: Season Three Trailer
description:
Want to know what Out Travel the System is all about? Here it is, in a snack-size trailer - what we want to do for you as listeners, and what we love most about talking about travel.

Let us know what you're thinking at any time on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram — we're @ Expedia!
